START:
üëã Hello, Welcome to anonymous chat bot

/help to see a list of commands

Send me text, links, gifs, stickers, photos, videos or voice messages and i will anonymously forward them to your partner chat.
HELP:
/find find a chat friend
/next stop chatting and find another friend
/stop stop chatting
/exit stop looking for a chat friend

/bug contribute to the project/report a bug

/ping check bot status
/users see the number of active users currently
CONTRIBUTE:
For those who want to contribute to the bot

like:
- adding features
- reporting bugs (bot not responding)
-promotion inside the bot
- etc.

please click the button below

FIND.WARNING_1: You are already in the queue
FIND.WARNING_2: You are already in a chat

NEXT.SUCCESS_2: Your partner has left the conversation
NEXT.WARNING_1:
You don't have a chat partner

/find to find a chat partner

STOP.SUCCESS_2: Your partner has left the conversation
STOP.WARNING_1:
You don't have a chat partner

/find to find a chat partner

EXIT.SUCCESS_1: Stopped searching for a chat partner
EXIT.WARNING_1: You are not in the queue

CONNECT.WARNING_1:
You don't have a chat partner

/find to find a chat partner
